text:
We had the problem that occasionally the server would report that on the mail
() funcion it could not start, with error:
Warning: mail(): Could not execute mail delivery program '/usr/lib/sendmail -
t -i ' in /export/home/digiprin/digiprints.nl/index.php on line 1266

When re restarted the webserver it was OK again, however since a day, the 
finction refuses to work when the apache server is started with SSL support.  
When not using the ssl support the progam has no problem.

we upgraded to the latest version of sendmail, PHP and Apache, but it does not 
work anymore with SSL.
creator: rstubbe@sit.nl
rstubbe@sit.nl
text:
It seems to be a limitation of maximum files/streams that is allowed open.  
used 58 Virtual Hosts and 4 SSL Virtual Hosts. After removing 1 Virtual host 
the problem dissapeared.
